properties.name: elastic.login.auth
properties.description: 登录认证的信息,需要配合 x-pack 使用.

properties.name: elastic.cluster.name
properties.description: 集群的名称.

properties.name: elastic.transport[n].name
properties.description: transport客户端的名称.

properties.name: elastic.transport[n].host
properties.description: transport客户端的主机信息.

properties.name: elastic.transport[n].port
properties.description: transport客户端的端口.

properties.name: elastic.transport[n].schema
properties.description: transport客户端的访问形式.

properties.name: elastic.restclient[n].name
properties.description: restclient客户端的名称.

properties.name: elastic.restclient[n].host
properties.description: restclient客户端的主机信息.

properties.name: elastic.restclient[n].port
properties.description: restclient客户端的端口.

properties.name: elastic.restclient[n].schema
properties.description: restclient客户端的访问形式.

properties.name: elastic.pool.maxTotal
properties.description: 池中最大链接数,默认是8.

properties.name: elastic.pool.maxIdle
properties.description: 池中最大空闲链接数目,默认是8.

properties.name: elastic.pool.minIdle
properties.description: 池中最小空闲链接数目,默认为0.

properties.name: elastic.pool.maxWaitMillis
properties.description: 当链接池资源耗尽时,等待时间,超出抛异常,默认为-1,阻塞.

properties.name: elastic.pool.testOnCreate
properties.description: 默认是false,创建一个链接时检测是否链接有效,无效则剔除,并尝试继续获取新链接.

properties.name: elastic.pool.testOnBorrow
properties.description: 默认是false,借取一个链接时检测是否有效,无效则剔除,并尝试继续获取新链接。.

properties.name: elastic.pool.testOnReturn
properties.description: 默认为false,归还一个对象时检测是否有效,无效则不放入链接池内。.

properties.name: elastic.pool.testWhileIdle
properties.description: 默认为false,指明空闲链接是否需要被【空闲链接回收器】【evict方法】检测,检测出链接无效则被移除。.

properties.name: elastic.pool.timeBetweenEvictionRunsMillis
properties.description: 空闲链接回收器运行的周期,单位ms,默认-1,永不执行检测.

properties.name: elastic.pool.numTestsPerEvictionRun
properties.description: 空闲链接回收器运行时检查的空闲链接数量,默认是3个.
